browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/30.0.1599.69 Safari/537.36

visible_files.cyber-dojo.sh:
gmcs -t:library -r:nunit.framework.dll -out:RunTests.dll *.cs
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
  nunit-console -nologo RunTests.dll
fi
visible_files.instructions:
Given a letter print a diamond starting with 'A'
with the supplied letter at the widest point.

For example: print-diamond 'E' prints

    A
   B B
  C   C
 D     D
E       E
 D     D
  C   C
   B B
    A

For example: print-diamond 'C' prints

  A
 B B
C   C
 B B
  A
